text: tame allaha sivaya murti'oni puja kari rahya cho ane juththi vato upajavi kadho cho, sambhalo! Je lokoni tame allaha sivaya bandagi karo cho, te'o tamari rojina malika nathi, basa! Tame phakta allaha pase roji mango ane teni ja bandagi karo ane teno ja abhara mano ane teni ja tarapha tamare pacha pharavanum che
